::Killfest::

Killfest nods, recieving the transmission and shutting off his comm.

"They're on their way," he says to his team, "Destruction is at hand."

Scyther steps forward, looking at Killfest. "Are you sure its wise to 
side with them, commander? Their faction is probably bigger than 
ours."

Killfest nods, "It probably is, but size is not all that matters."

THat sounded pretty strange coming from a 14-foot tall bot, but it 
was true nonetheless, "Besides, they may need some help leading. Most 
of the large faction leaders I've met thus far are incompetent."

His group laughed at that comment, the terrorists waiting for the 
shuttles to get there.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She got the transmission and smiled. "AH good, more troops." She 
> replied. "We'll send two transports over right away."
> 
> She called out to Drillbit and Diamond. "Go take two pods over and 
> get our new troops please."
